creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: blocky black and white image; male figure on knees with head tilted and hands up at R; torii gate in cartouche at C; text in background; artisans working on vessels at top; vessels at bottom with artisan in cartouche at R
inscription:
at top, from right: 釜師　象炭師　色着師
in center: 一、めでた　〱の　鍋宮様よ　ヤガエフ　鋳物　栄えて　世も栄える　エ
at bottom, from right: 台木　着色
portfolio: From Ironmonger's Marching Song (Yagaefu やがえ節)
title: Seventh song (part 9)
